overview: A car, a madman, a journey, a sexual awakening...join the journey if you dare.  Life gets complicated when an innocent young man unwittingly becomes the target of a psycho druggie and other intriguing men with issues. When young Drew, an aspiring actor, sets his sights on Hollywood, the characters he meets along the way provide enough drama to fuel a soap opera. There's drugs and sex; screwy mixups and sex; raunchy trucker sex; drunken gangbangers and rough sex; finally true love sex and ... yes, the promise of a new day.
title: Dare
